alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:35PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Duchesne County through 215 PM MDT... At 135 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tabiona, or 24 miles northwest of Duchesne, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tabiona, Hanna and Moon Lake. This includes Utah Route 35 between mile markers 32 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
